languages.text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g} есть). Если в экипировку персонажа добавлен медкомплект (сделать это можно в инвентаре), на панели в левой нижней части экрана отобразится его иконка. Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите эту иконку с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем наведите курсор на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней с целью клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Лечение в бою, Базовый навык: Медицина или вложивший хотя бы одно очко в развитие навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}медицина{/g} при повышении уровня. Количество восстановленного здоровья зависит от результата {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g} Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать персонажей новыми медкомплектами. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действий{/g}.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text:
Используйте медкомплект, чтобы восстановить здоровье членов отряда в бою. Выберите иконку медкомплекта в панели оружия слева, затем наведитесь на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет в трекере инициативы и нажмите {console_bind | Confirm}.
Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж со способностью Мастерство медицины — от результата проверки этой способности зависит количество восстановленных очков здоровья.
Лечение отнимает Очки Действий.

languages.text:
You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.
languages.original_text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g} есть). Если в экипировку персонажа добавлен медкомплект (сделать это можно в инвентаре), на панели в левой нижней части экрана отобразится его иконка. Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите эту иконку с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем наведите курсор на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней с целью клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Лечение в бою, Базовый навык: Медицина или вложивший хотя бы одно очко в развитие навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}медицина{/g} при повышении уровня. Количество восстановленного здоровья зависит от результата {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g} Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать персонажей новыми медкомплектами. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действий{/g}.

traits.locale_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an effect). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadY} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or their portrait in the initiative tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Medicae Training feature. A Medicae skill test determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with one charge being consumed per each use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's action points in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

languages.text:
Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje está herido o sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de tal tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono en la parte inferior izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín. Para usarlo, selecciona su icono con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y confirma la selección con {console_bind|Confirm}. A continuación, elige al personaje que necesite tratamiento y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines en objetivos adyacentes.
Solo los personajes que tengan la característica {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Medicina de campo{/g}, la {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}habilidad básica: Medicae{/g} o que hayan elegido el avance de habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} al menos una vez pueden usar botiquines. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de Medicae determina las heridas restauradas.
Cada botiquín dispone de 2 o más cargas y se consume 1 con cada uso. Al usar un botiquín, desaparecerá del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines a tus personajes con regularidad.
Ten en cuenta que la curación, así como la mayoría de las acciones, consumen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} del personaje en combate.
languages.original_text:
You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje está herido o sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de tal tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono en la parte inferior izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín. Para usarlo, selecciona su icono con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y confirma la selección con {console_bind|Confirm}. A continuación, elige al personaje que necesite tratamiento y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines en objetivos adyacentes. Solo los personajes que tengan la característica Medicina de campo, la habilidad básica: Medicae o que hayan elegido el avance de habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} al menos una vez pueden usar botiquines. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de Medicae determina las heridas restauradas. Cada botiquín dispone de 2 o más cargas y se consume 1 con cada uso. Al usar un botiquín, desaparecerá del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines a tus personajes con regularidad. Ten en cuenta que la curación, así como la mayoría de las acciones, consumen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} del personaje en combate.

languages.text: 戦闘中、部隊メンバーの{g|ib:Medikit}傷{/g}の回復、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}の治療、または特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く（キャラクターが負傷またはそのような{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けている場合）ために、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}メディキット{/g}を使用することができる。キャラクターがメディキットを装備している場合、アイコンが左下に表示される。アイコンが表示されていない場合、インベントリを開いて装備する。メディキットを使用するには、画面下のアイコンを{console_bind|DPadVertical}を使って選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}で選択を確定する。治療が必要なキャラクターを対象にして{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。キャラクターは隣接するターゲットに対してのみメディキットを使用できる。 メディキットを使えるのは、戦場衛生兵か基本スキル：メディケアを持つキャラクター、または{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルを最低1度向上させたキャラクターのみ。メディケアの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}結果で回復する傷の量が決まる。 各メディキットには2つ以上のチャージがあり、1回の使用で1つのチャージが消費される。使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消失するため、定期的に新しいメディキットをキャラクターに装備させるようにしよう。 回復は他のアクションと同様、戦闘中、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費する。
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、部隊メンバーの{g|ib:Medikit}傷{/g}の回復、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}の治療、または特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く（キャラクターが負傷またはそのような{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けている場合）ために、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}メディキット{/g}を使用することができる。キャラクターがメディキットを装備している場合、アイコンが左下に表示される。アイコンが表示されていない場合、インベントリを開いて装備する。メディキットを使用するには、画面下のアイコンを{console_bind|DPadVertical}を使って選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}で選択を確定する。治療が必要なキャラクターを対象にして{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。キャラクターは隣接するターゲットに対してのみメディキットを使用できる。 メディキットを使えるのは、戦場衛生兵か基本スキル：メディケアを持つキャラクター、または{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルを最低1度向上させたキャラクターのみ。メディケアの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}結果で回復する傷の量が決まる。 各メディキットには2つ以上のチャージがあり、1回の使用で1つのチャージが消費される。使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消失するため、定期的に新しいメディキットをキャラクターに装備させるようにしよう。 回復は他のアクションと同様、戦闘中、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費する。

languages.text:
在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左下角显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，双击鼠标左键装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，按下{console_bind|DPadVertical}选择医疗包图标，按下{console_bind|Confirm}确认选择，之后选择需要治疗的角色，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。
只有拥有{g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}野战医疗{/g}特性，或拥有{g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}基础技能：医疗{/g}，或至少进阶过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能一次的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。
每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。
请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左下角显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，双击鼠标左键装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，按下{console_bind|DPadVertical}选择医疗包图标，按下{console_bind|Confirm}确认选择，之后选择需要治疗的角色，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。 只有拥有野战医疗特性，或拥有基础技能：医疗，或至少进阶过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能一次的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。 每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。 请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
Mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} kannst du die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf regenerieren, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} behandeln oder {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g} entfernen (sofern der Charakter verletzt ist oder mit einem entsprechenden {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} belegt ist). Hat der Charakter ein Medikit ausgerüstet, wird dessen Symbol unten links angezeigt. Erscheint kein entsprechendes Symbol, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus. Um es zu benutzen, wähle das Symbol mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} aus und bestätige deine Wahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Visiere dann den Charakter an, der behandelt werden muss und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Ein Charakter kann mit einem Medikit nur Verbündete auf Nachbarfeldern behandeln.
Medikits können nur von Charakteren eingesetzt werden, die die Eigenschaft {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Feldsanitäter{/g}, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Grundfertigkeit: Medicae{/g} haben oder die Fertigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} mindestens einmal verbessert haben. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeits{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} auf Medicae bestimmt die Zahl der regenerierten Wunden.
Jedes Medikit hat 2 oder mehr Ladungen. Pro Einsatz wird 1 Ladung verbraucht. Benutzte Medikits verschwinden aus der Leiste am unteren Bildschirmrand. Rüste deine Charaktere also regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits aus.
Denke daran, dass Heilung im Kampf wie die meisten Aktionen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} verbraucht.
languages.original_text:
You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} kannst du die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf regenerieren, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} behandeln oder {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g} entfernen (sofern der Charakter verletzt ist oder mit einem entsprechenden {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} belegt ist). Hat der Charakter ein Medikit ausgerüstet, wird dessen Symbol unten links angezeigt. Erscheint kein entsprechendes Symbol, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus. Um es zu benutzen, wähle das Symbol mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} aus und bestätige deine Wahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Visiere dann den Charakter an, der behandelt werden muss und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Ein Charakter kann mit einem Medikit nur Verbündete auf Nachbarfeldern behandeln. Medikits können nur von Charakteren eingesetzt werden, die die Eigenschaft Feldsanitäter, Basisfertigkeit: Medicae haben oder die Fertigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} mindestens einmal verbessert haben. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeits{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} auf Medicae bestimmt die Zahl der regenerierten Wunden. Jedes Medikit hat 2 oder mehr Ladungen. Pro Einsatz wird 1 Ladung verbraucht. Benutzte Medikits verschwinden aus der Leiste am unteren Bildschirmrand. Rüste deine Charaktere also regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits aus. Denke daran, dass Heilung im Kampf wie die meisten Aktionen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} verbraucht.

languages.text:
Vous pouvez utiliser un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour restaurer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des membres de votre groupe au combat, soigner une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou neutraliser certains {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} (si le personnage est blessé ou sous le coup d'un tel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}). Si le personnage est équipé d'un médikit, son icône s'affiche en bas à gauche. Dans le cas contraire, ouvrez votre inventaire pour lui en attribuer un. Pour l'utiliser, sélectionnez son icône avec {console_bind|DPadVertical} et confirmez votre choix avec {console_bind|Confirm}, puis ciblez le personnage nécessitant des soins et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Un personnage ne peut utiliser un médikit que sur une cible adjacente à sa position.
Les médikits ne peuvent être utilisés que par les personnages possédant la caractéristique {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Soins de terrain{/g}, la {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}compétence de base : Medicae{/g} ou ayant reçu au moins une amélioration de la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} de Medicae détermine le nombre de blessures soignées.
Chaque médikit contient un minimum de 2 charges et chaque utilisation coûte 1 charge. Une fois utilisés, les médikits disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. N'oubliez donc pas d'équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits.
Notez qu'en situation de combat, les soins, comme la plupart des actions, coûtent des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or suffering such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez utiliser un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour restaurer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des membres de votre groupe au combat, soigner une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou neutraliser certains {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} (si le personnage est blessé ou sous le coup d'un tel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}). Si le personnage est équipé d'un médikit, son icône s'affiche en bas à gauche. Dans le cas contraire, ouvrez votre inventaire pour lui en attribuer un. Pour l'utiliser, sélectionnez son icône avec {console_bind|DPadVertical} et confirmez votre choix avec {console_bind|Confirm}, puis ciblez le personnage nécessitant des soins et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Un personnage ne peut utiliser un médikit que sur une cible adjacente à sa position. Les médikits ne peuvent être utilisés que par les personnages possédant la caractéristique Soins de terrain, la compétence de base : Medicae ou ayant reçu au moins une amélioration de la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} de Medicae détermine le nombre de blessures soignées. Chaque médikit contient un minimum de 2 charges et chaque utilisation coûte 1 charge. Une fois utilisés, les médikits disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. N'oubliez donc pas d'équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits. Notez qu'en situation de combat, les soins, comme la plupart des actions, coûtent des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|ib:Medikit}Sıhhiye çantası{/g} kullanarak çatışmada grup üyelerinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığını{/g} tazeleyebilir, {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlıklarını{/g} tedavi edebilir veya onları bazı {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkilerden{/g} kurtarabilirsin (Karakter sakatlanmışsa veya böyle bir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiye{/g} maruz kalmışsa). Karakterin sıhhiye çantası kuşanmışsa eşyanın simgesi sol altta görüntülenir. Öyle bir simge göremiyorsan envanterini aç ve bir sıhhiye çantası kuşan. Kullanmak için {console_bind|DPadVertical} ile simgesini seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} ile seçimini onayla. Ardından tedaviye ihtiyaç duyan karakteri hedefleyerek{console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas. Bir karakter sadece bitişiğindeki bir hedef üzerinde sıhhiye çantası kullanabilir.
Sıhhiye çantaları, yalnızca {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Saha Sıhhiyecisi{/g} veya {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Temel Yetenek: Sıhhiye{/g} becerileri olan ya da {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g} yeteneğinde en az bir kez gelişim kaydetmiş karakterler tarafından kullanılabilir. Yapılacak olan Sıhhiye {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testi{/g}, tazelenecek sağlık miktarını belirler.
Her sıhhiye çantasının 2 veya daha çok kullanım hakkı bulunur ve her kullanımda bu hak bir azalır. Kullanılan sıhhiye çantaları, ekranın altındaki panelden kaybolurlar. Bu nedenle düzenli aralıklarla yeni sıhhiye çantaları kuşanmayı unutma.
Çatışma sırasında yapılan çoğu eylem gibi iyileştirmenin de karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanlarını{/g} harcayacağını aklından çıkarma.
languages.original_text:

If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use it, select its icon using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to.
Medikits can only be used by characters who have the {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} feature, {g|f:37363b46061e46218f40e01ed81e9189}Base Skill: Medicae{/g}, or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored.
Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly.
Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.
